name: Vapornaut
description:
Vaporwave style space game that is controlled with only one key.

- Made for GMTK Jam 2019 -

-----------------

CONTROLS:
Use any key you want. Hit the aliens with the correct colored laser. Other instructions are in the game.

-----------------

Programming by Sarek Lambert

Art by Alexander Bergmann

Music / Sounds by Jannis Thein
